summary: As the body count rises, a killer keeps police guessing.
cast: Daniel Baldwin|Leslie Hope|John Neville|Roberta Maxwell|Mimi Kuzyk|Eugene Lipinski|Laura Catalano|Deborah Grover|Peter Keleghan|Morgan Freeman|Dean Stockwell|Joe Dinicol|Patrick Galligan|Trevor Haldenby|Topaz Hasfal-Schou|Colin Jefferson|Audrey Lupke
title: Aguas mortales
